nio/CSVReader.description: Read lines from a CSV file. For each incoming signal, one row is read from `file`.

file.title: File
file.description: File path to open and read.

loop.title: Loop?
loop.description: Return to start of file when out of lines.

default.description:
A list of signals of equal length to input signals.
  - *row* (array) The next line of the file, where each value (cell) of the row is an element of the array.

nio/CSVWriter.description: Write to a CSV file. For each incoming signal `row` is appended to `file`.

file.title: File
file.description: File name to write CSV data to.

row.title: Row
row.description: Data to write to the CSV file.

default.description: Any list of signals with data to write.
